tech_news.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise - NPR
tech_news.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available for other products such as computers and phones and that could drive up those prices too.

tech_news.description: From jumping hours to high-frequency, here are this year’s best revivals, as we're looking at the best vintage-inspired watches of 2025.

tech_news.description: "If you do exclusives you can push every lever to 11 in that platform"

tech_news.title: Behold the Manifold, the Concept that Changed How Mathematicians View Space - WIRED
tech_news.description: In the mid-19th century, Bernhard Riemann conceived of a new way to think about mathematical spaces, providing the foundation for modern geometry and physics.

tech_news.title: AEW Star Wears The Wrong Ring Gear At AEW Worlds End - Wrestlezone
tech_news.description: Speedball Mike Bailey looked a bit different at AEW Worlds End, as he was wearing his partner Kevin Knight's ring gear.

tech_news.title: Massive Rainbow Six Siege breach gives players billions of credits - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: Ubisoft's Rainbow Six Siege (R6) suffered a breach that allowed hackers to abuse internal systems to ban and unban players, manipulate in-game moderation feeds, and grant massive amounts of in-game currency and cosmetic items to accounts worldwide.
